patthana14.18:1.1_0: Āsavavippayuttaṁ sāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.18:2.1_0: Āsavavippayuttaṁ anāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana14.18:3.1_0: Āsavavippayuttaṁ sāsavañca āsavavippayuttaṁ anāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto nanoanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.18:4.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
